  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String userId)
        Takes the values and fills in the fields, also initializes the default BotInterface.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the User to be used.
        userId - A unique String id to identify this user.

    • Method Detail

      • getBots

        public java.lang.String getBots()
        Lists all bots the user has instantiated.
        Returns:
        A String detailing the user's bots.

      • newBot

        public java.lang.String newBot(java.lang.String type)
        Takes the name of the bot type to create and instantiates a class with that type.
        Parameters:
        type - A string of the name of the bot to be instantiated.
        Returns:
        String indicating the success of the action.

      • hasSelectedBot

        public boolean hasSelectedBot()
        Whether or not the user has selected a bot.
        Returns:
        A boolean about whether or not the use has selected a bot.

      • selectBot

        public java.lang.String selectBot(int index)
        Selects a current bot for the User.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the bot to be selected.
        Returns:
        Returns a String indicating the success of the action.

      • speakTo

        public java.lang.String speakTo(java.lang.String message)
        Speak to the User's currently selected bot.
        Parameters:
        message - What the User wants to say to the bot.
        Returns:
        A response message from the bot.
